text:
At that recording session,
I got lost trying to find the waiting room.

Oh...!
Studios can be tricky, huh...!

Yeah,
I called the Producer, and they came to pick me up.

That's a relief...
I'm glad Producer-san was there...!

But, for tomorrow's shoot,
we'll have Haruki-chan, so that's reassuring.

Huh... But...
I might get lost too...

I see... Well then,
if both of us get lost...

Hana-chan...! When push comes to shove,
let's call the Producer...!
